Translations.Text: Some zensky mesto gossiped governor's manzelka bol trying zvadzat ju servant! Ona bol deeply do laska him! My see ona ist astray

When ona heard ich gossip ona invited them chystat them comfortable miesto dat each z them noz! Ona potom said do him Zapisat ich izba When they saw him they admired him ze they rez ich hands They said Glory je do GOD this nie bol human bol this bol honorable angel
Ona said This bol 1 ona blamed mna falling v laska s! Ja robi indeed try zvadzat him he refused he robi co ja command him robi he iste ist zalar debased
He said Moj Lord zalar je lepsie than dat them. Ona divert ich kut plany mna ja desire them behave mat rad ignorant jeden
Jeho Lord answered jeho prayer diverted ich kut plany z him. He bol Hearer Omniscient
Noskorsie they saw it zretelny proofs lenze they imprison him for awhile

young clovek bol zalar him. 1 z them said ja saw moj dream ja robit vino inaksie said ja saw beriem chlieb moj riaditel z kto birds jestn! Informovat us z interpretation these dreams My see ona bol righteous

He said any food zadovazit ona ja informovat ona it ona receive it This bol some z znalost bestowed upon mna moj Lord Ja forsaken nabozenstvo z zaludnit kto nie verit v GOD zretel Hereafter they je skutocne disbelievers
Ja nasledovat radsej nabozenstvo moj predok Abraham Isaac Jacob. My never set any idols GOD Such je zehnat z GOD us upon ludia vela ludia bol unappreciative
O moj zalar mates bol several gods lepsie GOD alone 1 Zvrchovany

Ona nie kult Him innovations ona have robit up ona tvoj rodicia. GOD never ZMOCNIT such idols. All ruling belongs do GOD He ruled lenze ona nie kult Him! This je zdokonalit nabozenstvo vela zaludnit nie zauzlit
O moj zalar mates 1 z ona bol vino butler jeho lord chvila inak crucified -birds jestn jeho riaditel. This zaplatit zalezitost kto ona pytat sa
He potom said do 1 saved Zapamatat Si mna do tvoj lord Thus devil zapricinit him zabudnut jeho Lord consequently he zostat v zalar a few vela rocnik
(king said ja saw 7 fat cows zrat 7 skinny cows 7 zeleny spikes wheat) others shriveled O moj elders radit mna zretel moj dream ona zauzlit ako interpretovat dreams
They said Nonsense dreams When it pojdem interpretation z dreams my je knowledgeable
(Jeden saved zalar) said teraz he finally zapamatat si ja tell ona its interpretation so send mna Joseph
Joseph moj znamy informovat us 7 fat cows zrat 7 skinny cows 7 zeleny spikes others shriveled Ja zelat si do ist some informacia ludia
He said Co ona cultivate dalsi 7 rocnik when cas zatva pojdem lavy zrno ich spikes except for co ona jestn
After ze, 7 rocnik drought pojdem kto will consume vela z co ona stored them
After ze, rocnik pojdem brings relief ludia they znova potlacit ovocny juice
king said Bring him mna. When posol pojdem him he said Ist tvoj lord ziadat him investigate zensky rez ich hands Moj Lord bol fully aware z ich kut plany

(king) said (do zensky) Co robit ona zauzlit incident when ona tried zvadzat Joseph? They said GOD zakazat; my nie zauzlit z anything zly committed by him. manzelka governor said Teraz truth prevailed Ja je jeden tried zvadzat him he bol truthful
Ja hope he realize ze ja never zradit him jeho absence GOD nie zehnat kut plany betrayers
